ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisAppointment of CANDACE R. SALMON of Moncton, New Brunswick, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Employment Insurance Section, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 15, 2018.
